puavo.networking.ddns.dhcpd_interfaces.description: A comma-separated list of glob patterns of network interfaces that serve DHCP, for example ltsp*:wlan*

puavo.networking.dns.upstream_servers.description: Set upstream servers for dnsmasq via a configuration file and ignore /etc/resolv.conf

puavo.networking.ubnt.unifi.address.description: Address of Unifi controller, sent by DHCP server as part of DHCP request
